revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=LB-LINK |model=BL-WR3000 |revision= |asin= |fcc_date=01/30/2015 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=S8J-WR3000 |pwr_v=9 |pwr_amp=0.6 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM5357C0 |cpu1_cspeed=300 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model= |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag=yes,, 5-pad header,, |serial=yes,, 4-pad header,, |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM5357C0 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=LB-LINK_XXXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^LB-LINK_[A-F0-9]{6}$ |default_ip=192.168.16.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=44:33:4C |oui_eth=44:33:4C }} {{TagLine|300Mbps Wireless N Router}} :[http://www.lb-link.cn/products-detail.php?ProId=100 Product page] (''LB-LINK'')
"BL-R5357BF1" and "VER1.1" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
The sample SSID in ''B-LINK'''s manual is ''B-LINK_90E09F'', indicating that :the default SSID pattern is ''B-LINK_XXXXXX'' (w/ upper case hex digits) :.. this is presumed to be correct. '''WiGLE''' shows that two uses of this format w/ the ''B-LINK_9''XXXXX pattern :are using 44:33:4C (''Shenzhen Billian Electronic'') OUIs. :This is also presumed to be used...
Additional specifications, per the ''Shenzhen Billian Electronic'' site, follow... *Dimensions: [[Dimensions::185 mm x 123 mm x 177 mm]] <!-- I would ''guess'' this device would be [[Realtek]] based (RTL8196C + RTL8192CE).. :but who knows. It could even be using an older 2T3R [[Ralink]] chipset of some sort.. -->
===See also=== *[[LB-LINK BL-WR3000]] *[[LB-LINK BL-WR4000]] *[[LB-LINK BL-WDR4600]]
